WRITING.TEXT:
* **Breakfast**: EC Stack, Multi-Vitamin, 240mL Califia Farms Unsweetened Almond Milk, 26g Quest Chocolate Milkshake Protein Powder, 24g Mighty Nut Vanilla Powdered Peanut Butter (227) * **Lunch**: EC Stack, 200g Fage Total 2% Greek Yogurt, Quest Zesty Ranch Protein Tortilla Chips (280) * **Dinner**: EC Stack, 57g Thomas Light English Muffin, 28g TJ Sharp Sliced Cheddar Cheese, 142g TJ Frozen Chicken Breast, 10mL Hidden Valley Spicy Ranch Dressing, 89g Signature Kitchens Frozen Broccoli Spears (421)
**TOTAL**: 928
I'm afraid to jinx myself but things have been going surprisingly well with my current plan. Granted it's only been 10 days but I haven't binged at all... I ate at maintenance Saturday and Sunday but that was planned because I spent those days with my guy. And the best part is I'm back to losing consistently!
I lift weights MWF, I run TTh, and I swim Saturday mornings. So my plan has been 1000 (or less but hitting at least 100g of Protein) calories on the days I lift, and 500 (or less) on the days I run.
I feel like I always get messed up right before/around when my period starts but I don't know if the cravings are the result of me getting my period or if it's just my fucked up internal binge-monster using my period as an excuse... in any case I have three weeks before my cycle ends so hopefully willpower wins out this time around.

* **Breakfast**: 25mg Bronkaid, 200mg Caffeine, 25g Fiberone Lemon Bar (90) * **Lunch**: 25mg Bronkaid, 200mg Cafffeine, 57g Thomas Light English Muffin, 96g TJ Frozen Chicken Breast, 17mL TJ Pesto all Genovese (260) * **Dinner**: 25mg Bronkaid, 200mg Caffeine, 200g Fage Total 2% Greek Yogurt (150)
**TOTAL**: 500
Things have been good for the most part. Last week I stuck to my planned foods and then loosened the reins when I spent the weekend with my boyfriend. My weight went up yesterday morning unsurprisingly but I'm almost back down to where I was on Friday (127). This weekend should be even more manageable because I'm only spending Friday night/Saturday with my guy. I'm working on Sunday and I'll be too busy running around to even think about food.

* **Breakfast**: 25mg Bronkaid, 200mg Caffeine, 12g PB2, 6mL Canola Oil, 25g Fiberone Lemon Bar (185) * **Lunch**: 25mg Bronkaid, 200mg Caffeine, 60g Smores Quest Bar (180) * **Dinner**: 25mg Bronkaid, 200mg Caffeine, Fage Total 2% (150)
**TOTAL**: 515
I binged REAL bad Sunday night but I've been pretty well since then and the scale is finally back down to where I was last week. I don't feel great about undoing some of the progress I've made but I'm relieved to feel like I'm back in control. I've upped my EC stack a bit and it's definitely helping with my appetite.

I'm so sorry to hear you've been struggling but I agree having days off is important, especially when you need it. I hate that I associate food with comfort, but it is nice to have something I can fall back on when I'm feeling low.
I'm glad to hear you're feeling calmer and I hope that your new plan gives the support you need. I'm rooting for you. Cheers to a new start!
